page.title: 08SOCIAL ATTITUDES
page.content: {Government.}Hothfield & Westwell are jointly represented on the Ashford Borough Council by one councillor.They each have a separate Parish Council to look after the individual needs of the areas, elected by a majority vote from amongst themselves.Hothfield has a residents & tenants association.The Borough Councillor & the local member of Parliament are both Conservative. {Law and Order.}Police served by Ashford constabulary. One resident constable at Hothfield also responsible for Westwell. Burglary, vandalism & transportation violations are common.Hothfield has a speed limit and Westwell needs one. {Employment}in the area is no longer mainly on the land,some commuting, others employed in non-land-orientated industries.
